downloadTitle: .NET Rocks! - Stacy Harris Does Home Automation!
downloadDescription: Charles Stacy Harris talks about technologies used to automate his home using .NET interfaces. Geek out!
detailsSection: Charles Stacy Harris III - Is a Senior Software Architect with Microsoft Services. Stacy has been part of Microsoft's field services organization since 1992. In that time he has developed a wide range of software including device drivers for custom hardware, customer service applications, e-commerce web sites, prototypes for advanced aircraft instrumentation and was even on loan to the Microsoft Cluster Server development team for a short time.
systemRequirementsSection: Presentations are played using the Microsoft Windows Media Player.
installInstructionSection:
- Select "Save this Program to Disk" to copy the download to your machine for installation at a later time.
- Once the file has been downloaded, execute it in order to extract the media file.
